scripts.dev:aspida: npm run build:aspida && cd packages/aspida && node bin/index.js --build
scripts.dev:mock: npm run build:mock && cd packages/aspida-mock && aspida -b && node bin/index.js --build
scripts.build:aspida: npm run rimraf -- aspida && cd packages/aspida && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:axios: npm run rimraf -- aspida-axios && cd packages/aspida-axios && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:fetch: npm run rimraf -- aspida-fetch && cd packages/aspida-fetch && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:node-fetch: npm run rimraf -- aspida-node-fetch && cd packages/aspida-node-fetch && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:ky: npm run rimraf -- aspida-ky && cd packages/aspida-ky && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:mock: npm run rimraf -- aspida-mock && cd packages/aspida-mock && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.typecheck: npm run build:aspida && npm run build:mock && npm run build:axios && tsc --noEmit
